Vincent Massol wrote:

> Hi JUnit lovers,
> 
> Sorry for this intrusion but I feel you might be interested to know that
> the JUnit in Action book has shipped. 

I had the opportunity to review _JUnit in Action_ and I highly recommend 
it to anyone who'd like to see more of how to use JUnit in depth. It is 
/especially/ useful if you have just started using JUnit, but /anyone/ 
can learn from it.
